section.title: Documentation on Skolt Sámi
section.p: The files referred to below all are stored in the gt/sms/src/ directory. Note that the Skolt Sámi transducer differs from the other languages in not using twolc, but rather xfst as the rule formalism for the morphophonology. Skolt Sámi hus also uses a different make file than the other languages. Skolt Sámi is compiled by writing make while standing in the gt/sms/src/ directory.

ul.li: Documentation of the lexicon files the continuation lexica for N, A, V (sms-lex.txt), nouns noun-sms-lex.txt, verbs (verb-sms-lex.txt, adverbs (adv-sms-lex.txt), closed parts of speech (closed-sms-lex.txt), adpositions (pp-sms-lex.txt), punctuation marks: (punct-sms-lex.txt)
